name: Order Up!
description:
Order Up! is my submission for weekly game jam 95 with the theme "Bad Cooking".

In Order Up!, you make food items with physics-based controls, which isn't as easy as it sounds :)

Controls: 

Left Click to Grab/Interact
Hold Right Click while grabbing to rotate object
Scroll While Grabbing to bring object closer/farther
AD to rotate view
Tab to Pause and see Settings
Reset level in the settings menu

Sound Effects Attributions:

(All are Royalty Free, Public Domain)
